## How to use this 

- Filter by Module or search for a specific document
- Click 'back' in your browser to return to this index page


```{r index_create, echo=FALSE}
base_ve = '~/git/VisionEval-Dev'
output_dir = file.path(base_ve, 'Module_Docs')

index_list <- read.csv(file.path(output_dir, 'Module_Compile_for_Index.csv'))

Module_Doc_for_link <- sub('\\.md', '\\.html', index_list$Module_Doc)
Module_Doc_for_link <- sub('\\.Rmd', '\\.html', Module_Doc_for_link)
Module_Doc_for_name <- sub('\\..+$', '', index_list$Module_Doc)

# For kable:
# Link = paste0('[', Module_Doc_for_name, '](', Module_Doc_for_link, ')')

# For DT:
Link = paste0('<a href="', 
              Module_Doc_for_link, 
              '">',
              Module_Doc_for_name,
              '</a>'
              )


index_table <- data.frame(Module = index_list$Module, Link)

```

```{r index_out, echo = FALSE}

# kable(index_table)

datatable(index_table,
          escape = F,
          filter = 'top',
          options = list(pageLength = 15))

```
